agentData.mission: Create a single output-path helper (e.g., OUTPUT_DIR defaulting to ./outputs with optional env override) and refactor all writers to use it; add a pytest asserting no absolute /outputs paths are produced in logs or artifacts.

metadata.projectName: single output-path helper (e.g., OUTPUT_DIR defaulting to ./outputs with optional env override) and refactor all writers to use it; add a pytest asserting no absolute /outputs paths are produced in logs or artifacts.
